modName: Winterhold College Mage Student Dorm Improvements
summary: Tiny mod to make the College of Winterhold feel more like home
descriptionHtml:
Project: Winterhold College Mage Student Dorm Improvements
Author: Princess Stomper
Version: 1.0
Release Date: 09/11/2013
Category: Houses
Website(s): Steam, Nexus

==================
Requirements:
==================

Skryim

==================
Description:
==================

Tiny mod to make the College of Winterhold feel more like home

==================
Details:
==================

Player sleeping area:
- Added bedroll for companion
- Added potted plant
- Added bar stool for companion

Upstairs:
- Put some posters on the wall in the lounge area
- Added a coffee table
- Put a couple of more bottles strewn around (c'mon! Students!)
- Changed the seating for the more comfy-looking noble bench

==================
Known Issues:
==================

- Won't try to initiate philosophical discussion with you at 3am while under the influence of Skyrim's more exotic fungi, play bad indie or try to grow a beard

==================
Licensing/Legal:
==================

Credit for my work would be appreciated.

Do NOT include any part of this mod, including assets, in any project that is asking for or allows donations.
author: Princess Stomper

files.name: Winterhold College Mage Student Dorm Improvements
